name: ARSCNFaceGeometry
desc: A SceneKit representation of face topology for use with face information that an AR session provides.

items.name: init?(device: MTLDevice)
items.desc: Creates a SceneKit face geometry for rendering with the specified Metal device object.

items.name: init?(device: MTLDevice, fillMesh: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a SceneKit face geometry, optionally filling in gaps in the mesh for the eyes and mouth.

items.name: func update(from: ARFaceGeometry)
items.desc: Deforms the SceneKit geometry to match the specified face mesh.
